name: Goldweb Solutions
tagline: We help businesses grow online faster!
description:
Goldweb Solutions develops meaningful solutions for our clients. We are a web development company, having expertise in web site UX/UI design and mobile application.  In most projects, we work from scratch to the final solution. Also, we can work as a contractor for separate stages: UX / UI design, front-end or back-end development, on-page SEO, marketing automation and branding.
Our team has more than 10 years of experience in the market: 200+ satisfied clients, and 400+ delivered projects.
We offer:
- UX/UI design for sites and apps
- Website development (landing pages, websites, e-commerce)
- Onsite SEO optimization, Google Analytics, Webmaster Tools
- Discovery & Consulting, Digital Marketing
- Marketing Automation
Technologies we work with:
UX/UI design
– Responsive design for desktop and apps
– UI/UX/IA/IxD
– Сreating (Figma, Sketch, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator)
– Wireframing (Figma, Balsamiq)
– Prototyping (Figma)
– Assets handover (Zeplin)
Web development
– WordPress
– HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS, Bootstrap, Foundation
– JavaScript, jQuery, jQuery UI, AJAX
– LAMP (PHP, MySQL, Linux, Apache)
Processes
– Asana, Trello, Jira
– Agile, Scrum
– Git, SVN
We are always willing to meet your expectations and open to communication. Looking forward to hearing from you.
